mapper.select: SELECT s.*,m.*, round((6378.138 * acos (cos(radians(${map.latitude}))*cos(radians(s.latitude))*cos(radians( s.longitude)-radians(${map.longitude}))+sin(radians(${map.latitude}))*sin(radians(s.latitude)))),2) AS distance FROM tbl_member_location s,tbl_member m WHERE s.openid=m.openid AND s.openid IN(SELECT DISTINCT(openid) FROM tbl_qrcode_auth a WHERE bookid IN(SELECT bookid FROM tbl_qrcode_auth a WHERE openid=#{map.openid})) ORDER BY distance

SELECT s.*,m.*, round((6378.138 * acos (cos(radians(${map.latitude}))*cos(radians( s.latitude))*cos(radians( s.longitude)-radians(${map.longitude}))+sin(radians(${map.latitude}))*sin(radians(s.latitude)))),2) AS distance FROM tbl_member_location s,tbl_member m WHERE s.openid=m.openid AND s.openid IN(SELECT openid FROM v_openid WHERE userid=#{map.userid}) ORDER BY distance
